attributes.action: Remove forced prayer from schools, or change to prayers from all religions
attributes.additional_details: All religions should be taught an equal amount of time and all children should have access to this, all perants should be informed of any mandatory faith based activities.
attributes.background: Forcing children to follow one set religion on a daily basis in schools is unethical and wrong and making an allocated time everyday to pray to a god they may not believe in is archaic as a community we should be celebrating all faiths equally as we are meant to be portraying a diverse country.
